wordGroup: latex paint 乳胶漆，乳胶涂料
latex gloves 手套；医用手套

sentences.en: Two cerebrospinal fluid specimens have tested positive for Neisseria meningitidis serogroup by latex test.
sentences.cn: 通过乳胶测试，两个脑脊液标本对脑膜炎奈瑟菌血清群呈阳性反应。

sentences.en: Natural latex rubber is another option.
sentences.cn: 天然乳胶是另一中选择。
